reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, sexy, and flattering, with one noting it's perfect for New Year's Eve and another mentioning it's suitable for winter in Vegas. The material quality receives positive feedback, and the fit is nice, with one customer noting it hits right above the knee. The length receives mixed reviews - while some find it true to size, others say it's not short enough. The sizing is also mixed, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and Sexy (dress it up or down)
items.body: I like that you can wear this out to a party and look hot or a baseball game with some adidas and a ball cap and still look cute af and feel comfy af. I'm 5'7, was a little worried about it being too short, but it actually hits right above my knee, even wearing boots with a heel, the dress still didn't feel too short. In plus size usually wear xl or xxl depending on fit, some reviews said it ran a little small so I purchased a 3xl. I'm a bigger girl, 250 pounds, I still had plenty of room, wasn't too fitting, of course you can adjust that with the strings. The sleeves are longer (which you can even see that with the model) I probably could have gone down to a 2xl but was worried about the length. The shoulders actually come off the shoulder, I've bought off the shoulder shirts and dresses before that barely came off the should without forcing it down, you don't have to do that with this dress. Very Flattering, especially on bigger thicker girls. Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute, nice material
items.body: So I didn't upload a pic because quite honestly; the dress is too short on me. HOWEVER, it fits everywhere else wonderfully! The sleeves are nice and long. They hang past my palms. The material is thick and stretchy. You do have to lace it up yourself. I used tweezers to pull it through. I'm 5"6 265 lbs. My bust is 49 C, 46" waist, 53" hips. I carry my weight in my tummy so I believe that's why it was too short on me. Perhaps with a shaper I can pull it off. I hope so because it is a very cute dress. I have broad shoulders and both sides were still able to hang off both shoulders nicely. The color is accurate as advertised. I really have nothing bad to say about this dress. The only issue is I chose the wrong size. I ordered a XXL so I will be getting a XXXL next time because I really want the white and red one! Read more
items.author: ♡ Brit Brat ♡

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great
items.body: Nice quality material, sexy, just as described, fits great. Read more
items.author: Krystal B

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just Buy It!
items.body: This dress is amazing. The material is soft, stretchy and thick, the sleeves fit slightly loose, shoulder placement is perfect. I’m 5’6, thick on the bottom, 38D, I have a little bit of tummy, and usually where an XL-1X. I ordered a 2X based on reviews, and it’s everything. Hugs the curves and hides everything you want it too. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because the drawstrings are placed just slightly high. It still looks amazing, but I think an inch down would make it perfect. I will definitely buy in more colors Read more
items.author: Andrea

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Off shoulder mini dress
items.body: GOKATOSAU Club Mini Dress: Sexy Style with an Unfortunate Fit Caveat The GOKATOSAU Women's Sexy Casual Off Shoulder Long Sleeve Lace Up Loose Club Mini Dress aims to deliver a trendy and revealing look. However, a significant fit issue might hinder its wearability for some. Pros: Stylish Design: The off-the-shoulder style and lace-up detailing create a fashion-forward look that might appeal to those who enjoy clubwear aesthetics. Stretchy Fabric: The material is reported to be comfortable and stretchy, offering some flexibility in terms of fit. Affordable: This dress falls within a budget-friendly price range for clubwear. Cons: Awkward Lace-Up Placement: The biggest drawback lies in the placement of the lace-up sides. Multiple user reviews mention that the laces reach uncomfortably high, potentially sitting near or even under the armpits for some wearers. This can cause an awkward and potentially restrictive fit. Limited Size Information: While the product description provides size options, some users report inconsistencies in sizing and recommend ordering a size up. Overall: While the GOKATOSAU Club Mini Dress boasts a trendy design and affordable price, the unfortunate placement of the lace-up sides is a significant fit concern. This might be a dealbreaker for many potential buyers. If you're considering this dress, it's crucial to carefully review the size chart and be aware of the potential fit issues around the arms before making a purchase. It might also be advisable to look for alternative dresses with a similar style but a more comfortable and flattering lace-up design. Read more
items.author: SRAMAZON

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, Khaki, Pink, White, Iongrey, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
